name: Byzantine Name Generator
description: Unleash the glory of Byzantium! Crave a name that echoes with ancient emperors, cunning strategists, and opulent palaces? Our Byzantine Name Generator will transport you to the heart of Constantinople, forging a moniker fit for royalty (or at least, a really impressive LARP character).
introduction: Ever dreamt of ruling the Eastern Roman Empire? Okay, maybe not *ruling*, but at least having a name that sounds like you could? Our Byzantine Name Generator is your time machine to a world of mosaics, intrigue, and names that roll off the tongue like fine wine (or, you know, retsina). Prepare to be christened with a title worthy of the Golden Horn!
howToUse: Marvel at the Byzantine-esque name bestowed upon you.
Share your newfound title with the world! (Or just your cat, we don't judge.)
Repeat as needed until you find the *perfect* name. It's like trying on crowns, but without the risk of getting beheaded.

faqs.question: Is this generator historically accurate?
faqs.answer: We've taken some *artistic liberties*. While inspired by Byzantine naming conventions, we've also injected a healthy dose of fun. Think of it as historical fiction for your name.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my D&D character?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! In fact, we encourage it. Imagine the look on your DM's face when you introduce yourself as 'Theophylactus the Terrible, Bane of Bulgars'. Priceless.

faqs.question: Are the generated names actually *cool*?
faqs.answer: Define 'cool'! If your definition involves words like 'basileus', 'strategos', and 'purple-born', then yes, unequivocally cool. If you're looking for 'Chad' or 'Brittany', you're in the wrong empire.

faqs.question: Will using a Byzantine name grant me superpowers?
faqs.answer: We cannot guarantee superpowers. However, increased confidence, a heightened sense of drama, and the ability to pronounce ridiculously long words are highly probable side effects.

faqs.question: I don't like the name I got. What should I do?
faqs.answer: Click 'Generate' again! The Byzantine Empire lasted for over a thousand years; surely we can find you a name you like within a few clicks. Don't give up, future emperor!

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my pet?
faqs.answer: By all means! Imagine calling your cat 'Justinian' or your dog 'Theodora'. They'll be the most distinguished pets on the block.
